key.memos.name: Memories
category.memos.name: Open Memories Config
config.memos.title: Memories Config
config.memos.catalogScreenshots.tooltip: Should screenshot be saved to [gameDirectory/screenshots/$WORLD_NAME$] folder.
config.memos.chatMessage.tooltip: Content of chat message, leave blank for vanilla.
config.memos.stopwatchInterval.tooltip: How often screenshot should be taken(in minutes), also resets current countdown.
config.memos.stopwatchX.tooltip: X position in % of screen: 0 meaning left, 100 meaning right.
config.memos.stopwatchY.tooltip: Y position in % of screen: 0 meaning top, 100 meaning bottom.
